topic.title: My Java Gym App
topic.shortdesc: A mini java app for the gym specifically for specific gym programs. For now, I have only implemented a very simplified 5/3/1 from Jim Wendler.
topic.p: Following Jim Wendler's 5/3/1 Forever book, I aimed to implement the basics of the 5/3/1 program in this very early version of my app.

For now, it is a simple as inputting bodyweight amongst other 1 rep maxes and the program will just blurt out a basic 3 week program with 3 days a week of training. I am aware of the many, MANY variations of 5/3/1, all with different goals in mind, but I got the basics and foundation right from the first part of the book.

In future versions, I will implement a UI as well as other programs. The UI will hopefully be Swing graphics though I may explore other options as to familiarize myself with other libraries and APIs; I may also lean towards graphics libraries that feature graphs/tables as I think that will be a cool feature. I will also build more upon my current 5/3/1 features, specifically about customizing the program such as weekly training frequency (how many days a week), variations of 5/3/1, excluding some exercises, and many more!
